verbs.description: [ARG0: Brad Parscale , the campaign manager for President Donald Trump 's re - election campaign in 2020] , [V: called] on Twitter [ARG1: for Attorney General Jeff Sessions to be fired and the Russia investigation to be brought to a close on Tuesday] .

Brad Parscale , the campaign manager for President Donald Trump 's re - election campaign in 2020 , called on Twitter for Attorney General Jeff Sessions to [V: be] fired and the Russia investigation to be brought to a close on Tuesday .
